sentences.en: Miss Ophelia rose from this encouraging colloquy.
sentences.cn: 奥菲丽亚小姐觉得这段对话还比较满意,问完之后就站起身来.

sentences.en: Powell did not know why it was he had resolved to keep his own counsel as to his colloquy with Mr Smith.
sentences.cn: 鲍威尔不知道为什么决定要把他跟史密斯先生的谈话保守秘密。

sentences.en: The colloquy between them was brief.
sentences.cn: 他们之间的对话很简洁。

sentences.en: The colloquy which followed was brief and to the point.
sentences.cn: 两人的对话既简短,又直截了当.

sentences.en: They entered into eager colloquy with each other.
sentences.cn: 他们展开热切的相互交谈.

sentences.en: They stopped, and engaged in a whispered colloquy.
sentences.cn: 他们停下来, 小声地交换了一下意见.

words.tran_cn: 白话的；通俗的；口语体的
白话，口语；口语体；方言用语
